title: Trump Downplayed Covid Threat To Avoid Panic
itunes:title: Trump Downplayed Covid Threat To Avoid Panic
description:
Guests: Craig Gordon, Bloomberg Washington Bureau Chief, Jon Peede, Chairman of the National Endowment for the Humanities, Taylor Riggs, Bloomberg markets reporter, Roger Fisk, Democratic Strategist and Principal of New Day Strategy, and Matt Schlapp, Chairman of the American Conservative Union.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
